A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: With an overall theme of letting go of the past\, the irony is that with The Last Jedi\, it looks like time for adult fans to let go of Star Wars. It is no longer the imagination engine it was in our childhoods where the stories of Luke\, Leah\, Han and Chewie were whatever we wanted them to be. They're all gone. The well is dry. Let the kids have these new guys flying X-wings and fighting Apple brand Stormtroopers. It ain't for us anymore.
